title: A Catalogue of Crime: Being a Reader's Guide to the Literature of Mystery, Detection, and Related Genres
description: "A Catalogue of Crime," by Jacques Barzun and Wendell Hertig Taylor, is a critique of crime fiction first published in 1971. A revised edition was published in 1989 by Barzun after the death of Taylor in 1985. The book was awarded a Special Edgar Award from the Mystery Writers of America in 1972.
author: Jacques Barzun
